original_text: In great fear and distress Jacob divided the people who were with him into two groups, and the flocks and herds and camels as well.
korean_text: 야곱이 심히 두렵고 답답하여 자기와 함께 한 동행자와 양과 소와 낙타를 두 떼로 나누고

sentences.original_text: Jacob divided the people who were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱은 자기와 함께 있는 사람들을 나누었고

sentences.original_text: and the flocks and herds and camels as well
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 양떼와 가축과 낙타도 또한 나누었다
